author: Alan Henry
title: The Wraparound Workspace
text:
- Other: PlayStation 4, Amazon Echo Dot 
PC:- Case: BitFenix Aurora Desktop White- Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (MSI)- Storage: Samsung SSD 850 PRO 512GB (SSD)- RAM: 16.0GB Dual-Channel DDR3 2400MHZ- Motherboard: MSI Z87-GD65 GAMING (MS-7845)- CPU: Intel Core i5 4570 
The whole thing is pretty impressive, and that Echo Dot in the center is a nice touch, actually. If you’re looking for the wallpaper, it’s actually one image that spans all three displays, and elliotvs dropped the link for it in the thread at the battlestations subreddit (linked below.) Here’s another photo of the whole setup, from the top down: 
Elliotvs is a bit of a Steelseries fan, which we don’t blame him for one bit (personally, I’ve used that keyboard, and it’s a good mechanical, and I’m testing out that headset right now.) If you dig the look of the whole thing, head over to the imgur thread below for another shot we didn’t include here, or check out the full thread below to read more Q&A about the setup. Of course, if you do, give him your upvotes while you’re there, and let him know we love his workspace too. Advertisement
